mapper.select: select count(*) as num,a.chrsprmc from bj_xm_gckyzfqk c inner join ( select id,chrsprmc from bj_splc_zt where (chrsplclx,intxh) in (select chrsplclx,max(intxh) maxxh from bj_splc_zt where fcbz=1 and chrsplclx in ('zfqk') GROUP BY chrsplclx)) a on c.intsplcztid=a.id where fcbz=1 and c.intxmid=#{xmid} GROUP BY a.chrsprmc
